verses.text: \w Some|strong="G1722"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* later, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1525"\w* \w came|strong="G1525"\w* \w back|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* news \w spread|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*;

Some people \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, \w bringing|strong="G5342"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* paralysed man, \w who|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G2532"\w* \w carried|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w them|strong="G5342"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w unable|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w get|strong="G4374"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* near \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* removed \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w roof|strong="G4721"\w* \w above|strong="G3699"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* made \w an|strong="G2532"\w* opening, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G5465"\w* \w down|strong="G5465"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w mat|strong="G2895"\w* \w on|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* paralysed \w man|strong="G3361"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w lying|strong="G2621"\w*.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* man, \wj ‘\+w Child|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* sins \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* forgiven.’\wj*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* teachers \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Law \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* debating \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w minds|strong="G2588"\w*,

‘\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w does|strong="G5101"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w like|strong="G3779"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*? \w He|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* blaspheming! \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* forgive sins \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?’

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* once intuitively \w aware|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* debating \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w way|strong="G3779"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \wj ‘\+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* debating \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w minds|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w about|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w*?\wj*

\wj \+w Which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w easier|strong="G2123"\+w*? – \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* paralysed \+w man|strong="G5101"\+w*, “\+w Your|strong="G2532"\+w* sins \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* forgiven”? \+w Or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* “\+w Get|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w take|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mat|strong="G2895"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w*”?\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w so|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w may|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w Man|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w has|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* forgive sins \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w earth|strong="G1093"\+w*’\wj* – here \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* paralysed \w man|strong="G5207"\w* –

\wj ‘\+w To|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w I|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Get|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w take|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mat|strong="G2895"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* return \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w home|strong="G3624"\+w*.’\wj*

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3956"\w* \w got|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w took|strong="G2532"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w mat|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*; \w at|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w amazed|strong="G1839"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w praised|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w We|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w anything|strong="G3956"\w* \w like|strong="G3779"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*!’

\w Jesus|strong="G1831"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2532"\w* \w along|strong="G2532"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w Levi|strong="G3018"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* son \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Alphaeus, \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tax|strong="G5058"\w* office, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \wj ‘Follow \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*.’\wj* \w Levi|strong="G3018"\w* got \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* followed \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

Later \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w having|strong="G2532"\w* \w dinner|strong="G4873"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* number \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w tax|strong="G5057"\w* \w collectors|strong="G5057"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* outcasts \w took|strong="G1096"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* places \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w table|strong="G4873"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w following|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

Hearing \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w It|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w those|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w healthy|strong="G2480"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w need|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2192"\+w* doctor, \+w but|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w those|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w ill|strong="G2192"\+w*. \+w I|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w did|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w call|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* religious, \+w but|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* outcast.’\wj*

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*’s \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w fasting|strong="G3522"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*’s \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w fast|strong="G3522"\w*, \w while|strong="G1161"\w* \w yours|strong="G4674"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*?’

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w Can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* groom’\+w s|strong="G2192"\+w* friends \+w fast|strong="G3522"\+w*, \+w while|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* groom \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*? \+w As|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w long|strong="G5550"\+w* \+w as|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* groom \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w fast|strong="G3522"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w days|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1722"\+w* groom \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2532"\+w* taken away \+w from|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w fast|strong="G3522"\+w* \+w then|strong="G2532"\+w* – \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w comes|strong="G2064"\+w*.’\wj*

\wj ‘\+w No|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w one|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w sews|strong="G1976"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w piece|strong="G1915"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* unshrunk \+w cloth|strong="G4470"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w an|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w old|strong="G3820"\+w* \+w garment|strong="G2440"\+w*; \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do|strong="G1096"\+w*, \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w patch|strong="G1915"\+w* tears away \+w from|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* – \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w from|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w old|strong="G3820"\+w* – \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w worse|strong="G5501"\+w* \+w tear|strong="G4978"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w made|strong="G1096"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w one|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G1519"\+w* puts \+w new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w old|strong="G3820"\+w* wine-skins; \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w burst|strong="G4486"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* skins, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w both|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* skins \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* lost. \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w put|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w fresh|strong="G2537"\+w* skins.’\wj*

\w One|strong="G3588"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* walking \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* cornfields, \w his|strong="G1223"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w began|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w pick|strong="G5089"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* ears \w of|strong="G1223"\w* wheat \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2532"\w* \w along|strong="G2532"\w*.

\wj ‘\+w Have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3763"\+w* read,’\wj* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w David|strong="G1138"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w was|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w in|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w need|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hungry|strong="G3983"\+w*, \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w his|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w companions|strong="G3588"\+w* –\wj*

\wj \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w went|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w time|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2316"\+w* Abiathar \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w high|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w priest|strong="G2409"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ate|strong="G2068"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w consecrated|strong="G4286"\+w* bread, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w only|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w priests|strong="G2409"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* allowed \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w eat|strong="G2068"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w gave|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w some|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G1519"\+w* comrades \+w as|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2532"\+w*?’\wj*

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* added, \wj ‘\+w The|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w was|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w made|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w people|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w people|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w*;\wj*

\wj \+w so|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w Man|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w*.’\wj*
